data.title: Travel Essential for Italy - TESSAN Type L Plug Adapter Review
data.body:
Title: Travel Essential for Italy - TESSAN Type L Plug Adapter Review

I recently traveled to Italy and had the pleasure of using the TESSAN Italy Travel Plug Adapter with Type L Power Converter, and it proved to be an invaluable companion throughout my journey. With its convenient design and thoughtful features, this adapter quickly became a travel essential. Here's why the TESSAN Type L Plug Adapter deserves a place in every traveler's kit.

Seamless Compatibility with Italian Outlets (5/5):
The TESSAN Type L Plug Adapter flawlessly fits into Italian power outlets, ensuring a secure and stable connection. The snug fit eliminates any worries about loose connections or unreliable power supply, providing peace of mind for charging various devices.

Dual USB Charger Ports (5/5):
One of the standout features is the inclusion of dual USB charger ports. The ability to charge two devices simultaneously without sacrificing the main plug outlet is a game-changer. It saved me from carrying multiple adapters and allowed for efficient charging of my smartphone and tablet simultaneously.

Sturdy Build and Compact Design (5/5):
The adapter's sturdy build and compact design make it an excellent travel companion. The durable construction gave me confidence in its ability to withstand the rigors of travel, while the compact size ensured that it didn't take up unnecessary space in my luggage.

Universal Compatibility (5/5):
Beyond just Italy, the TESSAN Type L Plug Adapter proved to be a universal solution for my travels. Its versatile design is compatible with various Type L outlets in countries such as Chile and San Marino, making it a versatile and future-proof addition to my travel gear.

LED Power Indicator (5/5):
The LED power indicator is a thoughtful addition. It provides a visual cue, confirming that the adapter is properly connected and receiving power. This simple yet effective feature adds an extra layer of reassurance, especially when charging in unfamiliar environments.

Charge Multiple Devices Simultaneously (5/5):
The ability to charge multiple devices simultaneously is a real time-saver. With the dual USB ports and the main plug outlet, the TESSAN Type L Adapter allowed me to keep my smartphone, tablet, and camera powered up without any hassle. It significantly streamlined the charging process during my travels.

Travel-Friendly Voltage Compatibility (5/5):
The adapter's voltage compatibility is travel-friendly, accommodating both 110V and 240V. This feature ensures that it can handle a wide range of electronic devices, making it suitable for various travel scenarios without the need for additional converters.

Reliable Performance Throughout the Trip (5/5):
From the bustling streets of Rome to the serene landscapes of Tuscany, the TESSAN Type L Plug Adapter delivered reliable performance throughout my trip. It consistently provided a stable power supply, allowing me to stay connected and powered up in every location.

Affordable and Practical Travel Investment (5/5):
Considering its seamless compatibility, dual USB charger ports, sturdy build, compact design, universal compatibility, LED power indicator, simultaneous device charging, travel-friendly voltage compatibility, and reliable performance, the TESSAN Italy Travel Plug Adapter is an affordable and practical investment for any traveler heading to Italy or regions with Type L outlets. Its versatility and convenience make it a must-have for hassle-free charging on the go.

Conclusion:
In conclusion, the TESSAN Italy Travel Plug Adapter with Type L Power Converter exceeded my expectations and became an indispensable travel accessory. With its seamless compatibility, dual USB charger ports, sturdy build, compact design, universal compatibility, LED power indicator, simultaneous device charging, travel-friendly voltage compatibility, and reliable performance, this adapter offers a hassle-free solution for staying powered up during international travels. Highly recommended for anyone planning a trip to Italy or countries with Type L outlets.

Feel free to customize this review based on your specific experiences and preferences. If there are particular aspects you'd like to emphasize or if you have additional information to include, let me know!

data.title: Used in New Zealand
data.body: Light weight. 2 plugs. Excellent

data.title: So convenient!
data.body: I love this adapter! Works like a charm to charge my phone and kindle as well as plug ins. Well worth the cost.

data.title: Works fine.
data.body: Used it in Spain for laptop and iPhone to convert to the Spanish plug. Works fine. A little tight to use for more than one thing at a time, but on occasion, the dual ports or plugs came is useful.

data.title: Works great but use caution with bigger appliances
data.body: Adapter worked great during our time in Switzerland and Italy. We used it to charge phones, headphones, portable powerbanks, and other small electronics. However, this is NOT a voltage converter so be careful plugging in appliances like hair dryers. I made the mistake of plugging in my revlon hair dryer brush and it was too much and it sparked and started smoking so the revlon doesn’t work anymore.

data.title: It Produced QUICK / Effective Results!!!EASY To Use…
data.body:
All 5 Star Pros No Cons With Adapter.
It Quickly Adapts To Irish-Mode/ Charged I Phone 11 Immediately/ Plugged-In Flat Iron .
Th Adapter Is Light-And-Breezy UNCOMPLICATED/ Efficient To Use.

data.title: Modern and useful Plug Adapter
data.body: If you are going to Europe, I highly recommend this adaptor. It has 2 plugs for electric items and 2 USB inlets, It was very useful for our whole family.

data.title: Best option for travel
data.body: We have the big one that has all the different ports but this was a perfect solution for Europe. It was easy to throw in my bag and have easily accessible anywhere and worked perfectly with no additional cords in the airport, on the plane, and in hotels. Plus the price was great!

data.title: Functional power plug adapter
data.body:
This is a power plug adapter that adapts US-type power cords to plug into New Zealand wall power outlets. You can plug in two US type cords at once. In addition, you can plug in two USB cords at the same time. This device worked fine for me on a recent trip to NZ. However, it is a little bulky. The prongs stick out rather than retract or fold into the body.

I only used this for charging small electronics (phones and i-Pads. It appears to me that it would work for something like a hair dryer, too, but it doesn't look like there is any sort of power transformer, so you would need to make sure that you US hair dryer is rated for 220V input.

data.title: Reliable and sturdy
data.body:
This adapter worked perfectly for us and fit into Type C outlets reliably as we traveled to different destinations. I kept the small box that it comes in to protect it somewhat when not in use, to keep from knocking the outlet prongs out of place. I love that it allows for multiple USB devices.

Note: this is a plug adapter so US plugs can plug into non-US electrical outlets. It's perfect for small electronics that can take a range of input voltage. For example, Apple chargers take inputs from 100-240v and outputs the right charge for a particular device. It's not meant to convert power from one wattage to another. I saw some reviews saying their hairdryers and other devices were "fried". This convertor is not meant to convert wattage at all.

data.title: Great for Europe
data.body: Love the fact that you can use both USB cords and American plugs. Note: This is not a power converter. If you plug says it accommodates 110 volts and not 110-240 volts, you will blow the fuse and fry your appliance. Tends to therefore work with most computer USB ports but not with most hairdryers and curlers.

data.title: Great adapter
data.body: Ordered this at the last minute for a trip to Ireland. Was extremely surprised it got there in one day. It worked great. Highly recommend this item!

data.title: Right one for Australia/New Zealand
data.body: I got 2 of these- one for each of us- and they worked perfectly in both countries. It had everything we needed.

data.title: Works, but cheap
data.body: It worked well for my trip to Iceland, but I dropped it on the last day of my trip while packing and the prongs bent making it useless. Oh well, one less thing to pack home.

data.title: It works!
data.body: This plug adapter has all the pieces that kept me powered and ready to go while in London.

data.title: Tessan Type G - Ireland
data.body: The Tessan worked well, no issues at all.

data.title: Paris vacation
data.body: I purchased this before taking a trip to France. It came in a timely manner, and was exactly what we needed to charge our phones after a day of adventuring.

data.title: Very convinient
data.body: Great for charging overseas definitely a must have.

data.title: Great product and great service!
data.body: Great product and great service!

data.title: It's wobbly
data.body: It doesn't stay in wall well and is wobbly because it sticks out too far, especially once you add your phone charger or other American plug.

data.title: Outlet conversion
data.body: I like the fact it offers me two outlets

data.title: Power adapter
data.body: Did what it was suppose to do…very flexible

data.title: Best for travel
data.body: Used it in Italy worked great

data.title: Great adapter
data.body: Love the compact size and multiple ports. My travel buddy forgot her adapter but I could easily share mine with her.

data.title: Perfect for Ireland Trip
data.body: I bought this as we were traveling to Ireland for a wedding and it worked great at charging our phones. I did not use it for the hair dryer as we already had one in our hotel so I can not comment on its effectiveness with that but we were in Northern Ireland and it worked great for us.

data.title: Perfect
data.body: Worked great in Perth Australia

data.title: An absolute must when traveling to Australia. It also converts voltage
data.body: This travel adaptor with 2 plugs and 2 USBs is a traveler's dream. It effortlessly converts voltage, letting me use my US appliances in Australia without a hitch. The dual plugs and USB ports mean I can charge multiple devices at once. Compact, reliable, and super convenient – it's a must-have for globetrotters!

data.title: Haven’t used yet
data.body: This really looks like what it’s representing and until I get to Australia I can just say I am visually happy.

data.title: Worked in Ireland without issue
data.body: No issues in Ireland. Charged our devices. Just couldn’t fit two large plugs next to each

data.title: Useful
data.body: I took this with me to Italy and it was very useful and good quality

data.title: Good quality
data.body: Came in handy. Used to travel

data.title: It works
data.body: Yep, it works great.

data.title: Easy to use
data.body: We used this on vacation and allowed plenty of outlets for charging.

data.title: Worked great
data.body: Worked perfectly

data.title: WORKED LIKE A CHARM IN THREE COUNTRIES
data.body: gREAT ADAPTER. wORKED IN sPAIN, mORROCO AND pORTUGAL

data.title: Adapter works when outlet power turned on to charge.
data.body: NONE

data.title: Worked great
data.body: I took this with me on a trip to the UK. It worked great everywhere I went with no issues. Very glad I had it.

data.title: this works in Israel
data.body: Travelling in Israel

data.title: Great for your next Eurotrip!
data.body: This is a great product for your next trip to Europe. Do however be sure that this specific adapter will work on the country that you are visiting as some countries might require a different type of adapter. For the price this is a great option I used it for 3 months in countries such as Spain, Germany, France, Belgium, Czech Republic, among others, and I never had any issues with it. Do keep in mind this adapter is on the bigger size so if you want to have something to always carry on your purse or bag look for a smaller option. But this is great for charging your electronics all at once.

data.title: Excellent service
data.body: Happy with product and delivery

data.title: Served its purpose.
data.body: Though a little bulkier than expected the adapter serve its purpose!

data.title: Was great for a family that fits over who gets to charge!
data.body: This saved us in New Zealand! We were able to use one outlet and have a central charging "command center" which allowed us to keep up with cords and devices during our travels from place to place. Highly recommend this for ease and convenience!

data.title: Change the title!
data.body: Wish the title was more specific. It was a little misleading to be called European. I thought it would adapt to multiple European outlets but it only work in some countries. Worked fine and served the purpose but just beware of that

data.title: Good product
data.body: I travel a lot and often use it. No issues so far.

data.title: Plug met our needs
data.body: Went to Europe for a cruise and needed this for hotels. Was great having the extra plugs since they really didn't have many at all in the room which we weren't expecting. Also having the USB as well helped to not have to have so many of the adaptors.

data.title: Used is Morocco and Germany
data.body: Excellent product, used twice one in Morocco and then in Germany with the hair straighter and works great!

data.title: Great for travel
data.body: Went to Argentina with this. Perfect for 2 teens to charge phones and airpods.

data.title: Pretty good - not perfect.
data.body: This product works, but the prongs don't quite fit into the British outlets - they are too loose & the adapter is rather heavy, so it often falls out of the wall when it's plugged in. In addition, the openings for my cords to fit into are loose, so that they often fall out, too. So with the adapter falling out of the wall socket & the cords falling out of the adapter, it's tricky to use. I sometimes have to sit here with one hand on the adapter to keep it connected & that's pretty awkward. I can't walk away & leave it. Sometimes it stays plugged in, sometimes not. Other than that, it works fine.

data.title: To wide for dual outlets
data.body: This works well, however it is to wide if another plug is in the same double outlet. It needs to be about 5 mm narrower side to side, as it will not plug in all the way.

data.title: Good
data.body: This was very helpful when I was in London BUT I couldn’t plug in two 12v plugs at the same time which was frustrating.

data.title: Excellent
data.body: This was exactly what I needed for my overseas trips

data.title: Durable, Easy to Use, Powers FAST
data.body: I purchased two of these convertible charges for travel to Ireland. I was very impressed for the speed of charging and the easy use. This apparatus is well constructed and easy to carry in a handbag. I did spill a bit of water in the bag, let it dry for two days and the unit was unaffected ( I DON'T recommend having this near water!). I would purchase again if needed.

data.title: A must for foreign travel!!
data.body:
I just returned from Spain and Portugal and was told that most all of the hotels would be safe for our phones, iPads, etc. I was not worried about hair dryers as they were provided.
BUT, not one hotel was wired for our phones, iPads, watch, etc.....this was invaluable!!! My sister kept borrowing it from me to charge hers!!!!
Do not go to Europe without it!!!

data.title: Worked well except...
data.body: Worked on most of our trip, but didn't work in Switzerland though it was supposed to.

data.title: Great for traveling!
data.body: Bought this for a trip to Europe. Love that has a plug or usb option. Also great that there’s two outlet spots as me and my travel companion could just bring one adapter. Great value!

data.title: Worked great for charging phones, doesn’t convert voltage
data.body: This worked great for charging phones, Apple Watches, portable chargers, etc. but be careful that it doesn’t convert the voltage. The voltage in Europe (specifically Spain & Portugal) is way higher than that in the US. My hair dryer and my husband’s clippers did not work with this adapter because the voltage was too high. My hair dryer even started smoking!! Just something to know when traveling to Europe that we were totally unaware of 😊

data.title: Great product but for Italy needed an extra Piece a three prong.
data.body:
Went to Italy and this product worked great when we got a three prong at a grocery store that it can plug into. Otherwise it would not have worked in a
lot of the hotels there. Just a three prong one as well.

data.title: Perfect for a cruise or traveling in Europe
data.body: We had it for a transatlantic cruise and while staying at Rome, works perfect and is cruise approved.

data.title: use with iPhone plugs only
data.body: Charging two phones at once will work fine IF you have iPhone-type plugs (the small, white, boxy type). We brought one iPhone charger and one "Brand X" charger (which has a much bigger plug), and they would not fit into the adapter together, so we could only charge one phone at a time. So make sure your charger plugs are the small type, since one small/one oversize or two oversize will not fit at the same time.

data.title: Took this to Italy, Croatia, and Greece
data.body: I purchased this converter last minute. Right before my trip. And it worked out beautifully. I love the outlets and the USB outlets. Sometimes when you buy things last minute, it doesn't work out. This product turned out to be a win.

data.title: Worked
data.body: Worked but it’s so bulky sometimes it wouldn’t fit into European outlet

data.title: Versatile!
data.body: I like that the adapter has two usb ports to change phones. It worked flawlessly.

data.title: Economical and effective for overseas traveling
data.body: Compact and it works. I like that the USB plugs are separate from the electrical sockets, economical.

data.title: Good product
data.body: Does the job

data.title: Worked great!
data.body: Used this in Italy (Rome and Florence) and France (Paris), worked great! I was also able to use it on the airplane flying home from France (the plug in port for the phone charger wasn’t working at my seat-so plugged this in, then the charger cord into it, and it worked!) I recommend this is you travel to either of these countries!

data.title: Perfect for travel
data.body: I loved this plug in. It is about the size of my palm, so a little bigger than my last travel plugin. I liked having the 2 USB ports and then the regular US adaptors. It was exactly what my husband and I needed for our trip.

data.title: Travel plug
data.body: Worked fine on our trip to Italy

data.title: Worked great.
data.body: Needed to plug in my toothbrush charger (220V) and several USB cords. Worked great. I also was traveling to a European country so had to buy another type adapter. I actually spent about the same on this one and a European one as I would have if I bought the combo one. I was afraid I might loose some of the other plugs if I purchased the combo so this was fine. Took up just a little more space than the combo but that was ok.

data.title: Perfect for traveling!
data.body: I used this when I was traveling to London and it worked great! It’s very compact and has more than enough outlet space. Couldn’t recommend enough.

data.title: A little chunky but works well
data.body: A little big for a small backpack but works well. As for drying power (asked in the review), I cannot comment as this is not supposed to dry anything!!!

data.title: Highly recommend
data.body: Came in clutch for my Europe trip and saved outlet space with the added usb ports

data.title: Perfect for my trip to England
data.body: This was perfect for my trip to England. 10/10 would recommend

data.title: No issues
data.body: Used in Scotland for a 10-day trip. Very sturdy and had no issues with it or any safety concerns like some of the more sketchy adapters. In a perfect world it might be nice if the prongs slid inside while not in use to save luggage space but that is my only criticism.

data.title: Good for Australia.
data.body: Will know more when we get there.

data.title: Works great!
data.body: Works exactly as advertised. Definitely worth buying one before you go across the pond, cheers from Scotland!

data.title: Exactly what we needed
data.body: Perfect. Was delivered on time and was exactly what we needed

data.title: Trip to Italy: More than Enough
data.body:
All of the hotels we stayed at, but one, needed this plug. Secure hold to the wall upright or sideways. Two phones charged, 1 smart watch, and a wireless bluetooth device.

We'll be keeping this in our travel bag for next time we go overseas.

data.title: Worked Great
data.body: Worked great for my trip to the Netherlands and France!

data.title: They are excellent!!
data.body: They were excellent!! They were extremely useful!!

data.title: Though there are two outlets, there is no space for two.
data.body: Though there are two outlets, there is no space for two.

data.title: Works
data.body: I used this while traveling in Germany and it works. Don't be dumb like me though - this is NOT a converter. Make sure all your electronics can use 240v because all this does is allow you to plug them in with the different electric socket. Fortunately, all of mine were ok on 240. Another thing I didn't think of is using my laptop plugged into a power strip as this is too large to use on one. Fortunately a colleague had bought a converter with many different ends and shared those (smaller) plugs with me for use on a power strip. The one thing I didn't like about this is how large it is and it doesn't collapse making it a bit bulky for sticking in your luggage. But it did work as advertised; I just needed to read better before purchasing.

data.title: Worked flawlessly
data.body:
Worked without any problems in Europe.
Would be nice if it were just a tad smaller, but engineering is not my specialty so I don't know if that's possible. Saves taking multiple charging adapters.
I did not use any heating devices, so can't comment on that use. Just phone, Kindle, & camera use this trip.

data.title: Perfect for trip to France.
data.body: This was a great size - it fit easily in my suitcase, yet the multiple outlets and USB ports came in handy. I could charge my phone and extra battery pack at the same time at night. I had a hard time deciding which adapter to get, and I’m glad I picked this one.

data.title: Easy to use, made traveling much easier
data.body:
This plug does exactly what is expected. Just plug it into the Type C wall outlet (think most EU countries , but not England) and then plug in your USA device.

As noted in the description, this is not a converter, it is an adapter. If your USA device only works with 110 current (typically hair dryers, irons, etc), then this will not work as you need to purchase a converter. If your electrical item says 100V to 250V, this unit will work just fine.

Many electronics used today have USB charging wires (think cell phones, fitbit, kindle, etc). Having 2 USB ports in addition to the 2 electric outlets is a HUGE convenience.

My only "wish" would be if the 2 prong plug folded down to take up less space when traveling. But in fairness, the product description never implied that it folded down - it just would have been a "nice to have" feature

data.title: Plug for travel
data.body: The European plug adapter I purchased was an essential travel accessory. It worked flawlessly, allowing me to use my devices without any issues. The build quality was solid, and the compact design made it easy to carry in my bag. It provided a secure connection, and I never had to worry about compatibility. This adapter made my European travel experience much smoother, and I'd give it a 5-star review for its reliability and convenience.

data.title: Versitile
data.body: Bought this for a trip to Australia and New Zealand, and it was the only adapter we needed for multiple phones, iPads and Apple Watches. Worked really well.

data.title: nice
data.body: They are very useful in Europe, it is worth buying

data.title: Make travel so much easier
data.body: Recently I went to indonesia, I need the plug for that, I came across this one which has 2 usbs and 2 regular plug. The size is pretty compact to travel. Boy I’m so glad I choose this one. Who knew, my sister who came along with me also plug her stud in it

data.title: It works in Europe
data.body: Great! Glad I bought it

data.title: Great!
data.body: This item was great!. We got it for Germany and Italy. Highly recommend

data.title: Used in Australia for 3 weeks worked perfectly.
data.body: Used in Australia for 3 weeks worked perfectly for charging phones and camera batteries etc...

data.title: Love this purchase
data.body: Went to Spain for two weeks and having the adapter makes it so easy for me to use my hair dryer, curling iron, charge my cellphone with ease. I’m buying another adapter for my Asia trip next year.

data.title: It works
data.body: It worked well but keep in mind it does not reduce voltage, whatever you plug into it must be able to handle 220vac.

data.title: Works Great
data.body: This was perfect for my trip to South Africa. Used it for 3 months for all my electronics and it worked great the entire time.

data.title: To use in Ireland
data.body: We used this adapter to convert our plugs in Ireland. Worked like a charm. You really have to have one of these in the U.K.

data.title: Convenience
data.body: For travel came in handy. So many things need to be recharged on trips

data.title: Works great.
data.body: Bought these for our trip to Iceland and they were amazing.

data.title: All in one
data.body: Traveling with this adapter made charging super easy. Two USB ports and two plugs make it the only converter you need to take with you.

data.title: Nice adapter for UK plug in
data.body: We used for our trip this fall to the UK and it was nice to be able to plug in one CPAP and one cell phone at the same time.

data.title: Travel to Italy
data.body: It was a great adapter to use while traveling in Italy.
